Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Payment Handled across all successful variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Request Payment in variants without rejections
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total cycle time of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE until the next approval activity (e.g., Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER, or Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time between Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION in rejection loops
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Payment Handled in the most frequent variant
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average duration from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in variants that include budget owner approval
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Total elapsed time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in variants involving at least one rejection
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in pre-approver variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Minimum cycle time of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Payment Handled across all completed cases
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average waiting time after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE until the first approval or rejection occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE in rejection-return loops
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Request Payment in variants that skip budget owner approval
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in direct approval paths (no intermediate approvers beyond administration)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
